name: Flat Universe (Drillu, AstroBob, Neitron)
description:
Welcome to 'Flat Universe', a 2D clicker simulation where you create your own solar system but with... animals.

Experiment with different particles and fulfill your final goal: A functional cute solar system.

Controls:

Move Up-Left-Down-Right: W A S D                                                                                                              Interact: Right and Left Click

Team:

Astro Bob: Pixel Artist    Astro Bob#3236   

Neitron: Programmer   neitron#1987   

Drillu: Programmer    Drillu#2120

Made in 1 week for the Kindred's Game Jam with the theme 'At the beginning - It was nothing'
